subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Rafael Nadal of Spain was beaten by No. 28 Alexandr Dolgopolov of Ukraine, 6-3, 3-6, 7-6 (5), in the third round of the BNP Paribas Open.
snippet: Top-seeded Rafael Nadal of Spain was beaten by No. 28 Alexandr Dolgopolov of Ukraine, 6-3, 3-6, 7-6 (5), in the third round of the BNP Paribas Open.
